<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108501</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108501</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085860</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Becoming an online teacher</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Onlinelehrer werden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Devenant un professeur en ligne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transformando-se um professor em linha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Transformandosi in un insegnante in linea</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γίνοντας σε απευθείας σύνδεση δάσκαλος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Haciendo un profesor en línea</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">For even the most experienced classroom teacher, teaching online requires a thoughtful transition to the new environment.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Für gleichmäßiges benötigt der erfahrenste 
Klassenzimmerlehrer, online unterrichtend einen durchdachten Übergang
zur neuen Umgebung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pour même le professeur de salle de classe le 
plus expérimenté, enseignant en ligne a besoin d'une transition 
pensive au nouvel environnement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Para uniforme o professor o mais experiente da 
sala de aula, ensinando em linha requer uma transição pensativa ao 
ambiente novo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per persino l'insegnante dell'aula più con 
esperienza, insegnando in linea richiede una transizione premurosa al 
nuovo ambiente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Για ακόμη και τον πιό πεπειραμένο δάσκαλο τάξεων, να 
διδάξει απαιτεί on-line μια στοχαστική μετάβαση στο νέο 
περιβάλλον.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Para uniforme el profesor más experimentado de la
sala de clase, enseñando en línea requiere una transición pensativa
al nuevo ambiente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:BOBBY HOBGOOD

VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108501</entry>
